fs.polyglot.view
Class LanguageListCellRenderer

java.lang.Object
  fs.polyglot.view.LanguageListCellRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourceDependent, javax.swing.ListCellRenderer
public class LanguageListCellRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.ListCellRenderer, ResourceDependent

This implements a renderer for cells of language lists.

Author:
Simon Hampe

assignReference

public void assignReference(ResourceReference r)
Assigns a resource reference (if null, the FsfwDefaultReference is used) and reloads the icons. This doesn't cause any repaints

Specified by:
assignReference in interface ResourceDependent

getExpectedResourceStructure

public org.dom4j.Document getExpectedResourceStructure()
Description copied from interface: ResourceDependent
Returns an XML document, whose structure reflects the file/folder dependencies this class expects to be satisfied. The format of this document is completely arbitrary, it should be interpreted as follows:
- The root node corresponds to the base directory (but does not have to carry the same name)
- Every non-leaf node corresponds to a directory with the nodes name as directory name
- Every leaf node corresponds to a directory or file with the nodes name as directory/file name
- Text contents of nodes are generally ignored

Specified by:
getExpectedResourceStructure in interface ResourceDependent
